      • getSpriteImageDirectories

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSpriteImageDirectories(java.lang.String spriteName,
                                                                         java.lang.String filePrefix)
        Parameters:
        spriteName - the name of the sprite used to search the directories (finding folder)
        filePrefix - the prefix of the image for the sprite (finding file in folder)
        Returns:
        a list of directories containing the images for the sprite

      • convertPathsToPImages

        public static java.util.List<processing.core.PImage> convertPathsToPImages(java.util.List<java.lang.String> paths,
                                                                           processing.core.PApplet app)
        Parameters:
        paths - All image paths for the sprite, found from getSpriteImageDirectories
        app - The app object to load the PImages
        Returns:
        list of images for the sprite object to create an animation

      • createAnimation

        public static Animation createAnimation(java.lang.String spriteName,
                                        java.lang.String animationName,
                                        processing.core.PApplet app)
        Parameters:
        spriteName - the name of the sprite used to search the directories (finding folder)
        animationName - the name of the animation for the sprite e.g. up (file search)
        app - The app object used to load the PImages
        Returns:
        An animation object containing the images for that animation

        Parameters:
        spriteName - the name of the sprite used to search the directories (finding folder)
        app - The app object to load the PImages
        Returns:
        Returns animations for movable objects like enemies and the player
